channel.title: Hugo on Just my blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Just my blog

item.title: How to run HUGO under Docker
item.description: It is convenient to run such tool like Hugo (and many many others) under Docker, without installing it to a local machine. Here I will show you how to run Hugo under Docker, create new posts for the blog, generate static content - i.e. all basic operations that allow to add new and edit existing posts to the blog.
